meta.objective: Integrate implemented conflict resolvers into Monolith and resolve remaining open conflicts.

phases.name: Activate Conflict Resolution
phases.description: Connect the already implemented logic in `consistency_v8.py` and `genre_conflict_resolver.py` to the main pipeline.

tasks.issue: BPM/TLP and Genre/RDE resolvers are implemented but not called.
tasks.action:
After `rde` calculation (around line 680), instantiate `ConsistencyLayerV8` and call:
1. `resolve_bpm_tlp_conflict(bpm, tlp)` -> update `bpm`.
2. `resolve_genre_rde_conflict(genre, rde)` -> update `rde`.

tasks.issue: Color/Key resolver is implemented but not called.
tasks.action: After `color_wave` resolution (around line 715), instantiate `GenreConflictResolver` and call `resolve_color_key_conflict(key, color_wave, style)`. Update `key` if a resolution is suggested.

phases.name: Implement Open Resolutions
phases.description: Fix 'Open' (⚠️ OFFEN) issues from the status report.

tasks.action: In `resolve_color_wave`, explicitly prioritize `user_override` > `style_locked` > `emotion_color`. Add a comment block defining this hierarchy.
Implement `resolve_emotion_genre_conflict(emotion, genre)`: If `emotion='joy'` and `genre='gothic'`, force-shift genre to 'dark_pop' or similar compatible hybrid.
